captions.text: We're all looking for something
we're all looking for hope
hope you can't, just, have
just because you were born with hope
no we're born with pain
we're born and lived through difficulties
and in our life we have a choice
either to be angry for what we don't have
or be thankful for what we do have
it is your mindset that is going to allow you to spot opportunities where everyone else if frightened
victims are frightened are frightened by changed
leaders are inspired by change
if your mind is full or worry
you're going to miss the oppritunites
because you're focusing on what's not working
versus what is working
it's your job to make yourself do the crap you don't want to do
so you can be everything that you are suppose to be
and you're so damn busy waiting to feel like it
and you're never going to
you have to force yourself
and I mean force
you must really go for your own and realize how short life is
you got what you got, so you got to make the most of it
you really can't spend a whole lot of time worrying what is his
you have to go for your own
if you have an idea of what you want to do with your future
you must go at it with almost monastic obsession
be it music
the balley
or just a basic degree
you have to go at it single mindedly
being brave isn't suppose to be easy
and for me I feel it's the key way to keep moving forward
stop looking to other for approval
go about doing things to improve yourself
do what-ever you can to improve yourself
go make money for yourself, go to the gym, do what-ever makes you feel good
do it for your own reasons
but, what I'll ask you to do is this: go inside yourself, ok?
stop looking outside yourself but actually go inside yourself
and say
what do I really value? What is meaningful to me? What would I want to make out of my life?
not because I show it on a fucking magazine
not because I had someone tell me it was a value
but what would be a value to me
and if everyday you're taking action toward that outcome
give yourself a pass to feel fully secure
Captioned by Christian Sprague

do so keep up the good work.

I am just an old pedant when it comes to spelling so don't view it as 
criticism. ﻿

comments.author: Absolute Motivation

comments.text:
How we feel towards life can often times hold us back, it is hard to get up 
and get moving when you do not feel like doing it. This is the time to push 
yourself and go for it, to succeed in anything you have to push yourself. 
If you have a goal or dream within your heart, the first thing you need to 
do is focus on it and motivate your self to achieve it. Changes do not 
always come easy and we do get tired, stressed and discouraged, but if you 
really desire change, it is not based on how you feel, it is about giving 
everything you got within you and doing what you need to do.﻿

comments.author: Absolute Motivation

comments.text:
I started last year my AS year of studies and lost motivation quickly 
ending up playing video games and only achieving C,C,C,D. I didnt have a 
dream or goal and was living life for the sake of it. After finding you I 
have now become fit, I run my own successful gym club at school and my 
grades are at A's now. I now have a purpose and a long term goal that will 
benefit mankind greatly in the long run. You are part of the reason as well 
as some other channels why I have succeeded, thankyou. Hopefully I shall 
rise someday and be able to thank you for what you and others do for people 
like us.﻿
